resources.string: Hold camera towards the medicine bottle
The goal of the project is to develop a working Android application that can correctly and efficiently describe eyedrop medication bottles.

The application uses advanced YOLOv6 models trained on a custom 10,000 image dataset to detect objects that match the required parameters and subsequently reads aloud the medicine name for patients with poor vision.

The UCI Eyedrop Identifier App Team is a passionate team of individuals who bring diverse skills and expertise to the table. We are united by our shared vision and commitment to delivering excellence.
We value your feedback and are always here to assist you. If you have any questions, suggestions, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out to us at eyedrop.linresearchproject@gmail.com.
